page.shortlink: api client api a5 u element setcontent method

argument.name: element
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element or the ID of an element.

argument.name: html
argument.description: The HTML content to place in the element.

page.description: Sets the content of an element. Similar to calling .innerHTML on a DOM element with additional handling to preserve touch behaviors.

discussion.p: Using A5.u.element.setContent() is like setting the .innerHTML of ele. Unlike .innerHTML, A5.u.element.setContent() will not destroy drag scrolling behavior on objects such as Panel Cards.
